config_fields.name: bearer_token

config_fields.label: Consumer Key
config_fields.name: consumer_key

config_fields.label: Consumer Secret
config_fields.name: consumer_secret

config_fields.description: Twitter API access token (can also be set via X_ACCESS_TOKEN env var)
config_fields.label: Access Token
config_fields.name: access_token

config_fields.description: Twitter API access token secret (can also be set via X_ACCESS_TOKEN_SECRET env var)
config_fields.label: Access Token Secret
config_fields.name: access_token_secret

config_fields.description: Enable including post metrics (likes, retweets, etc.) in search results
config_fields.label: Include Post Metrics
config_fields.name: include_post_metrics

config_fields.description: Enable waiting when rate limit is reached instead of failing
config_fields.label: Wait on Rate Limit
config_fields.name: wait_on_rate_limit

config_fields.label: Client ID
config_fields.name: client_id

config_fields.description: Client secret from Server-to-Server OAuth app (can also be set via ZOOM_CLIENT_SECRET env var)
